SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent.misc

Class Organizer

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.misc.User
com.example.chicksevent.misc.Organizer
public class Organizer extends User
Represents an organizer user who manages events and their waiting lists.

Provides utilities to list entrants by status (e.g., WAITING/INVITED) and to broadcast Notification messages to entrants in a given bucket. Organizer identity is derived from the supplied user id, and actions are scoped to a specific eventId.

Firebase roots used:
  • WaitingList — read buckets and notify entrants
  • Organizer — reserved for organizer-specific data
  • Event — reserved for event reads/writes

Note: This class performs no authorization checks; callers should ensure only permitted users invoke organizer actions.
